title.text: Path to legal status, admitting refugees and improving border security are top immigration goals for Hispanics % who say each is a__ goal for U.S. immigration policy

values: Establish way for most immigrants in U.S. illegally to stay legally
Take in civilian refugees from countries where people are trying to escape violence and war
Increase security along U.S.-Mexico border to reduce illegal crossings
Increase deportations of immigrants in country illegally
